Midjourney Complete Guide 2026

Master AI Image Generation with Midjourney

What is Midjourney?

Midjourney is one of the most advanced AI image generation tools available. It creates stunning, artistic images from text descriptions. Known for its beautiful, painterly style and high-quality outputs, Midjourney is used by artists, designers, marketers, and creators worldwide.

Midjourney operates through Discord, making it accessible and community-driven. It's particularly strong at creating artistic, stylized images with excellent composition and aesthetics.

Getting Started

  1. Join Discord and create an account
  2. Visit midjourney.com
  3. Click "Join the Beta" to join Midjourney Discord server
  4. Subscribe to a plan through Discord
  5. Start generating images using /imagine command

Prompt Engineering Tips

âœ… Be Descriptive

Include details about style, mood, lighting, composition, and subject matter.

âœ… Use Style Keywords

Add terms like "photorealistic", "cinematic", "watercolor", "digital art" to guide style.

âœ… Use Parameters

Use --ar 16:9 for aspect ratio, --v 6 for version, --stylize for style strength.
